attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2007 promises to be the worst year in history for taxes on our homes.
No doubt council taxes will rise again this year above the rate of inflation.
Finance reviews by local authorities will provide them with many new ways to tax us, the time has come for us all to stand up and be counted.
Our homes are still our castles,we work hard to buy them and keep them in good order.
Are we going to allow this government to penalise us for all that we have worked for and achieved!

Sign this petition and send a strong message to Gordon Brown.

Enough is Enough !
